publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2999 Richard Lochhead: European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management-That the Parliament supports the establishment of a European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management in Scotland; notes the prestige that this would bring to Scotland and particularly the fisheries scientific community, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to the European Union and to Her Majesty's Government in support of a bid for such a centre.
S1M-2999 European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management (lodged on 17 April 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Christine Grahame*, Michael Matheson*

S1M-2999 Richard Lochhead: European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management-That the Parliament supports the establishment of a European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management in Scotland; notes the prestige that this would bring to Scotland and particularly the fisheries scientific community, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to the European Union and to Her Majesty's Government in support of a bid for such a centre. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Christine Grahame, Michael Matheson
S1M-2999 European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management (lodged on 17 April 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-2999 European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management (lodged on 17 April 2002) Kay Ullrich*
S1M-2999 European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management (lodged on 17 April 2002) Fergus Ewing*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2999 European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management (lodged on 17 April 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-2999 European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management (lodged on 17 April 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-2999 European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management (lodged on 17 April 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-2999 European Centre for Fisheries Research and Management (lodged on 17 April 2002) Tricia Marwick*
